subject: Federal Reserve Bank of New Yo
body:
Federal Reserve Bank of New York
Address: 33 Liberty St, New York,
NY 10045, USA
From The Desk of :
Mr. John C. Williams
CEO Federal Reserve Bank of New York USA
Dear Sir
Your Email  has been received.  
Therefore ,Find attached a copy of Our Payment Authorization Form, which you will Hand Fill Properly and Sign, then reattach back to me for final endorsement of the Transfer of your acclaimed and Approved funds .
As soon as I receive The Hand filled Payment Authorization Form  from you,
I will forward to you the Bank account information of our Auditor  where you will send the
 required sum of US$1,500.00 ( One Thousand,Five Hundred United States Dollars ) For the Programing of your funds
Also attached is my Working ID for your confirmation.
Awaiting for your positive Response.
Your Faithfully,
John C. Williams
CEO Federal Reserve Bank of New York
USA

subject: Re: Federal Reserve Bank of New Yo
body:
Hello Mr. John C. Williams,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. I appreciate your prompt response.

I have a few questions before we proceed further. Could you please explain to me in detail about this acclaimed and approved funds? How did it come into existence? 

Also, could you provide more details about the programming of funds that requires a sum of US One Hundred United States Dollars?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Jordan

subject: Re: Federal Reserve Bank of New Yo
body:
Federal Reserve Bank of New York
Address: 33 Liberty St, New York,
<https://www.google.com/maps/search/33+Liberty+St,+New+York,+NY+10045,+USA?entry=gmail&source=g>
NY 10045, USA
<https://www.google.com/maps/search/33+Liberty+St,+New+York,+NY+10045,+USA?entry=gmail&source=g>

From The Desk of :
Mr. John C. Williams
CEO Federal Reserve Bank of New York USA

Dear Sir,

There is no programing of funds here that required only US100.00 as you
indicated.

We Program people's funds here with the sum of US$1,500.00 ( One Thousand
Five Hundred United States Dollars Only.

Based on your question to explain to you how the money came about, You are
the one to tell us how it came about just for us to be sure that we are
dealing with you, because the funds is in your Name awaiting Clearance

And for us to clear the funds on your behalf and program it for you to
receive,

You are required to reconfirm all your information  which includes ,

1) Your Full Name::.....…...

2) Your Address:….........….

3) Your Direct Telephone Number:....

4) Your Bank Name:........

5) Bank Address:.............

6) Bank Account Name:....

7) Account Number:..........

8) Swift Code :..…...........

9) Routing Number:..........

10) A Copy of your Valid ID

11) Amount Expected.

Which is US$10,000,000.00 ( Ten Million United States Dollars.

As soon as you reconfirm all the above Ten information , I will attach to
you our Payment Authorization Form , which you will hand fill and sign and
return back to me through email attachment to enable me Clear out your
funds  and programe it and transfer to your norminated Bank Account

Awaiting to hear from you.

With Best regards.

Mr.John C. Williams.

CEO Federal Reserve Bank of New York

USA.

subject: Re: Federal Reserve Bank of New Yo
body:
Hello Mr. Williams,

Thank you for your email and the detailed information provided. It's quite interesting to learn about the process of fund programming at the Federal Reserve Bank of New York.

I'm curious, how does this process work exactly? Is it common for funds to be held in someone's name like this? I must admit, I'm not very familiar with these financial procedures.

Also, could you please clarify what you mean by "clearing out" funds? Does this involve any specific steps or procedures?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Jordan

subject: Re: Federal Reserve Bank of New Yo
body:
Dear Sir ,
Thank you for your response.
I think I have narrated to you the procedures. Meanwhile you are required
to take the instructions there in to enable us proceed. without any further
delay.
Therefore, reconfirm all the information required from you to enable me to
send you the Payment Authorization Form which you will hand fill , sign and
reattach back to me with the  proof of payment of the required US$1,500.00
for the Clearing and Programing of your funds which will be credited to
your nominated Bank Account.
without any further delay.
With regards
John C. Williams

subject: Re: Federal Reserve Bank of New Yo
body:
Hello John C. Williams,

Thank you for your prompt response and the detailed information provided. I appreciate your guidance on this matter.

However, I would like to understand a bit more about the process. Could you please elaborate on what exactly is meant by "Clearing and Programming" of funds? Also, could you provide some more details about the Payment Form?

I'm looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Jordan

subject: Re: ATTACHED IS THE PAYMENT AUTHORIZATION FORM .HAND FILL IT , SIGN AND RETURN IT BACK TO ME THROUGH EMAIL ATTACHEMENT
body:
Federal Reserve Bank of New York
Address: 33 Liberty St, New York,
NY 10045, USA

From The Desk of :
Mr. John C. Williams
CEO Federal Reserve Bank of New York USA

Dear Sir,

Clearing, Processing , Programing , Crediting :
Those are Banking Terms ,of Which I have explained to you what to do to get
your funds credited into your Bank account without any further delay.
Therefore Forward to me all the required information which have be short
listed to you in my previous email which will enable me to attach the
Payment Authorization Form
which you will hand Fill, sign and return Bank to me through email
attachment with the prove of Payment of the required US$1,500.00 to enable
us Process and Clear out your Pending funds
at the US Clearing House, then Program and Credit your funds into your
Nominated  Bank Account.

Attached also is My Work ID for your Verification.

Awaiting to receive the required information.
With Best Regards
From Mr. John C. Williams
CEO Federal Reserve Bank of New York

subject: Re: ATTACHED IS THE PAYMENT AUTHORIZATION FORM .HAND FILL IT , SIGN AND RETURN IT BACK TO ME THROUGH EMAIL ATTACHEMENT
body:

I am a bit confused about the required US that you mentioned in your email. Could you please clarify what this is? Also, could you kindly resend the shortlisted requirements from your previous email? I seem to have misplaced it.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jordan

body:

Thank you for reaching out to me from the Federal Reserve Bank of New York. I'm quite intrigued by this process you've described, it sounds very official and important.

Could you please explain a bit more about what this "Clearing, Processing Programing and Crediting" process entails? I'm not very familiar with banking terms, so your patience is appreciated.

Also, could you clarify what the "Short Listed required" means? I want to make sure I understand everything correctly before proceeding further.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best regards.

Jordan

subject: Re: Federal Reserve Bank of New Yo
body:

Thank you for your detailed message. I must say, it's quite intriguing to hear about this situation involving funds in my name. However, I'm a bit confused about how this came to be. Could you perhaps provide more information on how these funds ended up in my name? 

Also, I noticed that you've asked for some personal and banking details from me. While I understand the need for such information in certain circumstances, I'm not comfortable sharing them over email due to security reasons.

I look forward to hearing more about this situation and understanding it better.

Best wishes,
Jordan

subject: Re: Federal Reserve Bank of New Yo
body:
Dear Sir,
I have explained to you severally about.  the process.
Forward the information required from you first by Hand filling the Payment
Authorization Form attached to you.
Without that you will never understand the process. No matter how many
times I explained it to you , you will never understand it.
I am waiting to receive the Form well hand filled and signed.
With regards
John.

subject: Re: Federal Reserve Bank of New Yo
body:
Do you just enter your Bank and ask them to release money to you varberly?
Without filling a form?
I know you will ask me again to explain to you what it is all about.
Then I will term you to be a moron.
You were asked to reconfirm your information, which includes your Address,
Telephone Number and others, till now you never send any . You just
continued to ask unnecessary questions that does not make any meaning.
Ask me again.
John.

I

subject: Re: Attn: Mr. Jordan ( FOLLOW MY INSTRUCTIONS URGENTLY )
body:
Dear Sir,
I have answered all the questions before now in my previous emails.
Just reconfirm all the listed information required from you and send the
required money then all the process of your payment will take effect
without any further delay.

And as soon as you send the information by filling the Form attached to you
, I will send to you the Bank Account information of our Auditor where you
will send the required US$1,500.00 of the charges for Clearing ,
Processing, Programing and Transferring of your funds into your nominated
Bank Account.

With Regards
Kennedy.

body:

subject: Re: Attn: Mr. Jordan ( FOLLOW MY INSTRUCTIONS URGENTLY )
body:

hand fill the form,
Sign it and reattach it back to us.
Kennedy.

subject: Re: Attn: Mr. Jordan ( FOLLOW MY INSTRUCTIONS URGENTLY )
body:
Hello Mr. Jordan,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm reaching out in reference to the email from our CEO, Mr. John C. Williams. He has provided a detailed explanation of all the necessary processes in his previous emails.

If you could kindly print out the form attached and go through it at your convenience, that would be great. Once you've filled it out by hand and signed it, please reattach it and send it back to us.

Could you please confirm when you expect to have this completed? Also, if there are any parts of the form or process that aren't clear, don't hesitate to ask for clarification.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Jordan

body:
